name: Scribble Slash
description:
Scribble Slash is a simple, fast paced action game where you control a Doodle agains hordes of enemies who are focused on ending your existence. Defeat enemies to charge up the blood gauge and unleash a powerful attack!

Features:

12 rounds or waves of enemies to defeat.

3 Boss rounds.

Controls:

Directional keys: Movement.

Z: Dash.

X: Slash attack.

C: Blood Attack (Uses the blood gauge)
